message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a bit more as a gesture of goodwill to reach a quick agreement. Let's both walk away with a great deal!

Hi Alice, since you face a 5% inflation penalty per round and I don't, we should reach an agreement quickly. This split recognizes your time pressure while being fair to both of us. If we delay further, your share becomes worth less to you, so this is actually a good deal considering the circumstances.
Bob, I understand the inflation issue, so I am making this offer where you get a bigger share. Let's agree quickly before inflation reduces my effective gain even more.

Alice, I appreciate your improved offer. Let's try to meet in the middle here. This offer gives you $420000 now, which is better than waiting more rounds where inflation will continue to reduce your effective gain. At the current 5% inflation per round, delaying further significantly hurts your return. This is a fair deal considering our different inflation rates, and I hope we can agree and conclude our negotiation.
